speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0197/2007 ) by Mr Barón Crespo and Mr Brok, on behalf of the Committee on Constitutional Affairs, on the roadmap for the Union’s Constitutional Process ( 2007/2087(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the report ( A6-0197/2007 ) by Mr Barón Crespo and Mr Brok, on behalf of the Committee on Constitutional Affairs, on the roadmap for the Union’s Constitutional Process ( 2007/2087(INI) ).
agenda_item: Roadmap for the European Union's constitutional process (debate)
